title: Why not synchronise chat for solo queue disputes?
body:
EDIT: REFERRING TO NORMALS. WHERE CALLING IS THE STATUS QUO.

EZ fix. Solves huge problems with regards to lane calling.

Rito. Pls.

replies.body: Because people people at 300 elo believe whoever called the role first gets that role.
I'm referring to normals. Where that is actually the status quo.

> [{quoted}](name=ArcticHorizon,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Axt0oTBj,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-02-22T10:24:41.858+0000)
>
> I'm referring to normals. Where that is actually the status quo.

You said solo queue. Which is what the ranked queue is called.

It is also what normal queue is called. It is a queue that you can join as a solo player. The term is not limited to just ranked. Also, given I couldn't possibly be referring to ranked (due to drafting/pick order) it's logical to assume I meant normals.
False, solo queue is ranked not normals.
Prove this. And explain how normals is not a queue that you can solo in.
Have you been playing for a week? A month? Its been known that solo queue refers to ranked since season 1, yes you heard me season 1 and its not changing because of you.

kek. Even if that's the case, I'll use it the way I want. I find it highly intuitive using the term for soloing both queues. You'd find great comfort amongst conservative social groups.

*It's this way because it's always been this way. It's not about to change. It cannot be any other way. It's the way things are.*

> [{quoted}](name=ArcticHorizon,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Axt0oTBj,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2015-02-26T10:32:12.193+0000)
>
> It is also what normal queue is called. It is a queue that you can join as a solo player. The term is not limited to just ranked. Also, given I couldn't possibly be referring to ranked (due to drafting/pick order) it's logical to assume I meant normals.

Who the %%%% calls normal queue, solo queue?

SOLO. QUEUE. 

I AM QUEUING WITH RANDOMS. INDEPENDENTLY. NOT PREMADE WITH ANYONE. IN A QUEUE. SOLO. QUEUE.

NORMALS HAS A QUEUE. RANKED HAS A QUEUE.

SORRY. FOR. YOUR. INFERENCE.
How about people grow up and stick to the pick over call theme of draft pick?

> [{quoted}](name=yaiamone,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Axt0oTBj,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-02-22T06:23:26.290+0000)
>
> How about people grow up and stick to the pick over call theme of draft pick?

in norms????
It'd at least solve the issue somewhat.
It had not been clarified that the poster meant norms instead of ranked solo que when I posted
Given my argument is preposterous when applying it to ranked games, it's very safe to assume I meant normals.

> [{quoted}](name=yaiamone,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Axt0oTBj,comment-id=000100000001,timestamp=2015-02-22T12:03:11.955+0000)
>
> It had not been clarified that the poster meant norms instead of ranked solo que when I posted

apart from the soloque part, it's fairly obvious though.
what an original idea. 10/10, never been thought of before. this man is the future.
